{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Iron Plate |image = [[File:Iron_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Iron Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Steel}} }} ==Description== The '''Iron Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Iron Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Steel Gems]] {{Gem|Steel}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Iron Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Mt Mortar|Epic}} {{LootItem|Petalburg Woods|Epic}} {{LootItem|Rusturf Tunnel|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Granite Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Meteor Falls|Epic}} {{LootItem|Sealed Chamber|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Iron Island|Epic}} {{LootItem|Spear Pillar|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Stark Mountain|Epic}} {{LootItem|Mistralton Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Reversal Mountain|Epic}} {{LootItem|Plasma Frigate|Epic}} {{LootItem|Dragonspiral Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|P2 Laboratory|Epic}} {{LootItem|Frost Cavern|Epic}} {{LootItem|Terminus Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hokulani Observatory|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lake of the Sunne and Moone|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
